snippet: Keith Haring's exuberant and explicit depiction of gay sex came at the height of the AIDS epidemic and was completed several months before he himself died of the disease.
abstract: Keith Haring's exuberant and explicit depiction of gay sex came at the height of the AIDS epidemic and was completed several months before he himself died of the disease.

headline.main: A Joyful Mural, Born in a Time of Shame and Fear
headline.print_headline: A Joyous Mural, Born In an Era Filled With Fear
